content.rendered:
PhotoFun UV3G Hyper Protection Lens

“PhotoFun UV3G Hyper Protection Lens” have been specially developed by Yash Optics & Lens. Photofun lenses helps to protect your eyes from Sunlight. Its sensitive color-changing molecules instantly detect ultraviolet light. Perfect clear indoors, they are designed to quickly change into a darker shade in the sun and outdoors.

More Active, More Faster

BlueBlock Lenses by LUSTRAA - "Your World In-Sight"

BlueBlock Lustraa coated lenses with advanced protection from Digital Screen Protection by filtering harmful blue and UV rays to gives your eyes maximum protection for ensuring Happy Eyes and Healthy Life.

Lenses shine with the latest innovative coatings.

Eyes smile with ultimate care and protection

Every day, your precious lenses are comforted with many unwanted challenges…
Scratches, Dust, Water, Smoke, Reflection, UV Rays
As a result, not only is your lens life reduced, but it also affects your vision clarity and tires your eyes causing eye fatigue. You need a suitable quality coating to adequately protect your lenses and enjoy continued comfortable viewing.
Presenting LUSTRAA range of ultimate and innovative premium coatings to deliver that exclusive protection your lenses need and the complete eye care that you deserve.
We also present the innovative Lustraa coating; an ever increasing range of premium, quality coatings for delivering ultimate protection.

Our Brands
